Date: Saturday, 6/7/1993
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Danny Jackson

Bobby M. Jones is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 7 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor

Subject: Progress of Jose Paniagua
Dear Sir,

He has an ERA of 2.49, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
